meals.title: Grilled Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
meals.description: Grilled salmon fillet served with a side of roasted vegetables.

meals.title: Zucchini Noodles with Marinara Sauce
meals.description: Spiralized zucchini noodles topped with homemade marinara sauce.

meals.title: Lemon Herb Chicken with Steamed Broccoli
meals.description: Juicy lemon herb chicken breast paired with steamed broccoli florets.

meals.title: Shrimp Stir-Fry with Brown Rice
meals.description: Succulent shrimp and colorful vegetables stir-fried and served over a bed of brown rice.

meals.title: Vegetable Curry with Quinoa
meals.description: A flavorful vegetable curry made with a variety of spices, served with quinoa.

meals.title: Baked Chicken Breast with Sweet Potato Mash
meals.description: Tender baked chicken breast served with creamy sweet potato mash.

meals.title: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
meals.description: Tender beef strips, broccoli florets, and a savory stir-fry sauce, served over steamed rice.

meals.title: Eggplant Parmesan with Whole Wheat Pasta
meals.description: Breaded and baked eggplant slices topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese, served with whole wheat pasta.
